item.title: Bajaj Finserv Q1 Preview: Stock May See Further Upside If This Key Resistance Level Is Breached, Says SEBI RA Rohit Mehta
item.description: Despite a 4% drop in early trade on Friday, the stock has formed a bullish base on its weekly chart. The analyst pegs ₹2,150 as resistance to watch.

item.title: US Beverage Market Gets Its Fizz Back: Keurig Dr Pepper Joins Pepsi, Coca-Cola In Beating Quarterly Estimates
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper CEO said the operating environment remains "dynamic," and the second half of the year will present “new challenges."

item.title: NextCure Stock Soars After-Hours On Promising Preclinical Data For Rare Bone Disease Treatment
item.description: NC605 boosted bone density and quality, including improved cortical thickness and reduced bone fragility.

item.title: Medium-Term Trade Ideas: SEBI RA Flags Tata Motors, IPCA Labs, Atul Auto And 4 More Stocks For Breakout Ahead
item.description: FACT, IVP, and others may see 15–25% upside over 6–9 months if key support levels hold, said the analyst.

item.title: Trump Says ‘I’ll Be Watching’ After Sparring With Powell Over Fed Renovation Costs, Central Bank Chief Claps Back Publicly
item.description: When Trump mentioned the $3.1 billion figure during his tour and pulled out a document detailing the costs, stating it had just been released, Powell ...
